name: wepin-web-sdk-v1
description: Monorepo for wepin web sdk v1 packages

scripts.build: yarn workspace @wepin/login-js build && yarn workspace @wepin/provider-js build && yarn workspace @wepin/api-js build && yarn workspace @wepin/sdk-js build
scripts.dev: yarn workspace @wepin/login-js dev && yarn workspace @wepin/provider-js dev && yarn workspace @wepin/api-js dev && yarn workspace @wepin/sdk-js dev
scripts.publish-login: yarn clean && yarn && yarn workspace @wepin/login-js publish
scripts.publish-provider: yarn clean && yarn && yarn workspace @wepin/provider-js publish
scripts.publish-api: yarn clean && yarn && yarn workspace @wepin/api-js publish
